images.caption: Tŷ Mawr, Castle Caereinion

description: Llanfair Caereinion is a small riverside town located in Montgomeryshire, Powys. This walk in the village takes you to the River Banwy and the Llanfair Caereinion rail station. The station is the terminus for the Welshpool & Llanfair Light Railway . The wonderful heritage steam railway runs to Welshpool via Castle Caereinion. You could enjoy a scenic ride and then enjoy a stroll along the Montgomery Canal to the historic Powis Castle . You can also pick up the Glyndwr's Way and Offa's Dyke Path in this area. These long distance waymarked paths are an ideal way of further exploring the area on foot.
